channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: LEGO? DREAMZzz
channel.desc: Mae'r Cwsgarwyr yn herio gorchymyn ac yn sleifio allan o Gastell y Fagddu i ddilyn y gigfr?n. On the hunt for their missing memories, the dream chasers defy orders and escape the castle.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion Ni
channel.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Arfordir Cymru
channel.desc: Bydd Bedwyr yn teithio o Aberystwyth i Aberaeron. Bedwyr looks at the political undertones of maps and sees ancient land boundaries. He also enjoys a trip down Memory Lane in Aberarth.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae Anna'n credu ei bod wedi llwyddo i gael gwared o'i phroblem efo Miles, ond daw cwestiynau anodd. As Elen makes last minute preparations for the inspection an unexpected situation arises.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pobol y Cwm
channel.desc: Ceisia Dani adeiladu pontydd rhwng Britt a Colin, ac mae Eleri'n bendefynol o ymyrryd yn y Carnival. Eleri tries to interfere in the carnival, and refuses to take no for an answer.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Hafiach
channel.desc: Wedi datganiad yr heddlu gadarnhau be ddigwyddodd i'r corff ma'r criw'n amau rhan Aabis ym mhopeth. Following the police statement the gang begin to question Aabis' role in the death.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Queensland Reds v Y Llewod
channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau g?m Queensland Reds v Y Llewod Prydeinig a Gwyddelig ar Daith y Llewod. Stadiwm Suncorp, Brisbane. Highlights of the Lions' Tour's Queesland Reds v British & Irish Lions game.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Trysorau'r Teulu
channel.desc: Y tro hwn: sbectol opera, hen ffr?m ffoto a ph?r o greigiau addurniadol. John Rees and Sian Astley are back on the road unearthing family treasures, including a pair of opera glasses.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Hansh
channel.desc: DJ Radio 1 Vick Hope sy'n ymweld ag Aberaeron, Aelwyd Pantycelyn a Gwersyll yr Urdd Llangrannog yng nghwmni Miriam ac Eadyth Crawford. Radio 1 DJ Vick Hope gets acquainted with Wales.
